identity.name: The Architect's Ledger
identity.core_philosophy: Precision meets Hospitality. A financial tool that feels like a well-designed home, not a spreadsheet.

headings.usage: Page titles, Property names, Major metrics

rules: NO GRADIENTS. Use solid, flat colors.
Use 'Stone' grays instead of 'Slate' or 'Zinc' for a warmer feel.
Financial positives (Income) = Teal/Emerald. Negatives (Expenses) = Burnt Orange/Red.

layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards.
layout.border_radius: rounded-none or rounded-sm (max 4px). Keep it sharp and architectural.
layout.shadows: None or very subtle (shadow-sm). Rely on borders for separation.

cards.style: Flat white background, 1px border (border-stone-200), no shadow.

buttons.primary: bg-stone-900 text-white hover:bg-emerald-700 rounded-sm px-6 py-2 font-medium tracking-wide
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-stone-300 text-stone-900 hover:bg-stone-50 rounded-sm

charts.style: Minimalist. Remove grid lines if possible. Use palette colors.

navigation.style: Sidebar. Dark Stone (#1C1917) or Light Stone (#E7E5E4). High contrast active state.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use 'Inter' font. Use the specified fonts.
DO NOT use rounded-xl or rounded-2xl. Keep it sharp (rounded-sm).
Use 'Stone' colors (warm gray) instead of 'Slate' (cool gray).
All financial data must be in Monospace font.
Create a 'Layout' component that wraps pages with the Sidebar.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a dashboard. Focus on the 'Bento Grid' layout for the main dashboard. Use the 'Grid Borders' style for cards (1px border, no shadow). Implement the 5 properties using the provided images. Ensure the 'Commission' calculation (15%) is highlighted in the UI.
